document_data.mainbody:
Darion Sulmest was a cobbler inhabiting Waterdeep, City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Darion was the main point of contact for the Order of Cobblers & Corvisers circa the . He held the title of "Spokesman of the Order" and worked out of both the Cobblers & Corvisers House, which was their headquarters along Soothsayers Way in the Trades Ward
